statements: SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations;
SELECT victim_name, violation_type FROM human_rights_violations WHERE victim_age > 18;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Discrimination';
SELECT perpetrator_name, victim_name FROM human_rights_violations WHERE perpetrator_name LIKE '%police%';
SELECT id, victim_age, violation_type FROM human_rights_violations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations WHERE victim_age > 18 ORDER BY victim_name DESC;
SELECT victim_name, violation_type, perpetrator_name FROM human_rights_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Discrimination' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_violations, violation_type FROM human_rights_violations GROUP BY violation_type HAVING total_violations > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT(victim_name) FROM human_rights_violations WHERE perpetrator_name LIKE '%Robert%';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations WHERE victim_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY victim_age DESC, perpetrator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM victims;
SELECT victim_name, victim_gender, violation_type FROM victims ORDER BY victim_age DESC;
SELECT victim_id, victim_name, violation_type FROM victims WHERE victim_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT perpetrator_name, relationship_to_victim FROM perpetrators ORDER BY perpetrator_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM victims ORDER BY victim_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT victim_id, victim_name, violation_type FROM victims WHERE victim_age > 25 ORDER BY victim_age ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT victim_name, violation_description FROM victims WHERE violation_type = 'Theft' OR violation_type = 'Assault' ORDER BY victim_name;
SELECT * FROM perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY perpetrator_age DESC;
SELECT perpetrator_name, violation_details FROM perpetrators WHERE relationship_to_victim = 'Family' OR relationship_to_victim = 'Friend';
SELECT * FROM Victims;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM Victims WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name FROM Perpetrators ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Violations WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT victim_id, perpetrator_id, date FROM Violations WHERE perpetrator_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Victims ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC
SELECT name, age, description FROM Victims WHERE age > 30 AND nationality = 'USA'
SELECT v.date, v.description, vp.name AS perpetrator_name FROM Violations v JOIN Perpetrators vp ON v.perpetrator_id = vp.id WHERE v.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT v.description AS violation_description, vp.name AS perpetrator_name, vv.name AS victim_name FROM Violations v JOIN Perpetrators vp ON v.perpetrator_id = vp.id JOIN Victims vv ON v.victim_id = vv.id WHERE vp.organization = 'ABC Inc'

SELECT v.date, vv.name AS victim_name, vp.role AS perpetrator_role FROM Violations v JOIN Victims vv ON v.victim_id = vv.id JOIN Perpetrators vp ON v.perpetrator_id = vp.id WHERE vp.role = 'Manager' ORDER BY v.date DESC
SELECT * FROM victims;
SELECT victim_name, violation_type, violation_date FROM victims WHERE victim_age > 18;
SELECT perpetrator_name, perpetrator_age, relationship_to_victim FROM perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_gender = 'Male';
SELECT violation_description FROM violations WHERE violation_type = 'Physical Abuse';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM victims WHERE victim_age > 30 ORDER BY victim_gender DESC, victim_name ASC
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) AS num_violations FROM violations GROUP BY violation_type ORDER BY num_violations DESC

SELECT victim_name, perpetrator_name, violation_type FROM victims INNER JOIN perpetrators ON victims.victim_id = perpetrators.victim_id INNER JOIN violations ON victims.violation_type = violations.violation_type WHERE perpetrators.perpetrator_age < 40
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA' ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT violation_type FROM violations
SELECT * FROM victims ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT name, gender, country FROM victims WHERE country='USA'
SELECT id, affiliation FROM perpetrators ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM violations WHERE type='Human Rights Violation'
SELECT name, date, location FROM violations
SELECT * FROM victims WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC, id

SELECT name, gender, occupation, country FROM victims_violations INNER JOIN violations ON violations.id = victims_violations.violation_id WHERE type = 'Physical' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT perpetrators.name, perpetrators.country, violations.type FROM perpetrators_violations INNER JOIN perpetrators ON perpetrators.id = perpetrators_violations.perpetrator_id INNER JOIN violations ON violations.id = perpetrators_violations.violation_id WHERE perpetrators.country = 'United States'
SELECT id, name, age FROM victims WHERE gender = 'Male' AND occupation LIKE '%Engineer%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_victims, country FROM victims GROUP BY country HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_victims DESC
